casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1959

(December 1, 1959) Jean Hochberg et al., as Administrators of the Estate of Philip Hochberg, Deceased, Appellants, v. Petite Lady Dress Co., Inc., et al., Respondents.

Order unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the respondents. No opinion. Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, M. M. Frank, Valente and Stevens, JJ.
